title: Police identify teen fatally shot last week on Roosevelt Avenue
content:
Police have identified the teenager fatally shot May 4 on the first block of Roosevelt Avenue,.
Raekwon Jabbar, 18, was one of four teenagers who were struck by gunfire in an attack that appeared to be gang related, investigators said money. The three other people were treated at Erie County Medical Center.
No arrests have been made in the shooting. Police have urged anyone with information to call the confidential Buffalo Police Tipcall line at 847-2255.
